H0.text: In which country is the Sky Train Rail bridge. United States

H1.text: In which country is the Sky Train Rail bridge. China

H2.text: In which country is the Sky Train Rail bridge. Japan

H3.text: In which country is the Sky Train Rail bridge. ᑲᓇᑕ

A4.text: SkyTrain is the medium‑capacity rapid transit system serving the Metro Vancouver region in British Columbia, Canada.

A5.text: SkyTrain uses the world's third‑longest cable‑supported transit‑only bridge, known as SkyBridge, to cross the Fraser River.
